snippet.title: Terror: Endless Night | Feardemic's Fear Fest Teaser
snippet.description:
⚓ Wishlist 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1878730/Terror_Endless_Night/
⚓ Attend Feardemic's Fear Fest on Time 👉 https://fearfest.online/ and see the full trailer!
❄️Coming Q1 2023. ❄️ 

🧊 Feel the cold embrace of the sea in Terror: Endless Night, a frosty survival-strategy game based on true events. 🧊

⚓ Follow social media for more content ⚓
Discord 👉 https://discord.gg/6ECZhExu96
Facebook 👉 https://www.facebook.com/Feardemic
Twitter 👉 https://twitter.com/feardemic
Instagram 👉 https://www.instagram.com/feardemic/
Tik Tok 👉 https://www.tiktok.com/@feardemic
Twitch 👉 https://www.twitch.tv/feardemic

🧊 Manage your crew ⚓
Each crew member is a living person with their own skills, and they all have their needs that need to be taken care of but so does the ship. Assign shifts, manage your supplies, and pass laws, all to one end - survive.
🧊 Make decisions and live with their consequences ⚓
Trapped in ice and with limited supplies, you’ll be forced to make difficult decisions to keep your crew alive. Will you show compassion or let the shattering frost reduce human lives to a cold-hearted calculus? Will you die with dignity or feed on your comrade’s body to live another day? What will you do?
🧊 Stay sane ⚓
The harsh cold and the polar night are reasons enough for someone to break. Add hunger, pain, and seeing your crewmates perish, either from the elements or by their own hand, and the weight of your reality becomes simply unbearable. You may yet come back from this mission, but will it be with body and brain intact?
